name: Hotel Mario II
overview:
Mario and Princess Peach were having a fun picnic alone one afternoon. Suddenly, a Magic Door appeared out of nowhere. Curiously, Peach entered the door. Within moments Mario heard Peach screaming for her life. Mario quickly entered the door before it vanished. When Mario awoke he was amazed by the giant tower that stood before him. "I wonder if Peach has been taken in there," he pondered as he rushed inside.

This is a complete overhaul hack for The Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle with graphics from Super Mario Bros, Super Mario Bros 2, and Super Mario Bros 3 replacing the original graphics and every level was newly created for this hack with the Carrot Level Editor.
